alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Thomas County through 815 PM CDT... At 738 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Levant, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colby. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 43 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
